Class DownloaderWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void>
      • com.moomoohk.Mootilities.MooDownloader.gui.DownloaderWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DownloadHandler, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Void>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<java.lang.Void>

    public abstract class DownloaderWorker
extends javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void>
implements DownloadHandler
    Should be using when writing a GUI shell for the Downloader.

    The DownloaderShell class utilizes this class.

    Since:
    Dec 24, 2013
    Author:
    Meshulam Silk (moomoohk@ymail.com)
